pr_title: Fix critical issues detected with SonarCloud

timeline.bodyText: What's the reason of this change?
timeline.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText:
https://sonarcloud.io/project/issues?id=gwenneg_quarkus&open=AXAxfMfPgbHBif7sECGm&resolutions=FIXED&severities=CRITICAL
The DEFAULT constant is actually defined in ByteBufAllocator which is implemented by PartialPooledByteBufAllocator.
replies.author: gwenneg

timeline.bodyText: What's the reason of this change?
timeline.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText:
https://sonarcloud.io/project/issues?id=gwenneg_quarkus&open=AXAxfQvxgbHBif7sEC6s&resolutions=FIXED&severities=CRITICAL
The TYPE_JAR constant is actually defined in AppArtifactCoords which is extended by AppArtifact.
replies.author: gwenneg
